column5: It has proven what I have been told so far. Well except the floating part. I,ll leave that for later, hope not. LOL  It,s light, wears like a  office suit and it is so warm.  I was baking it it the last two days. -18 yesterday and -14 today. My clam suit was the same, but very bulky and doesnt float.  Money well spent IMO.
Looking forward to trying my suit out.  Got mine sent up from Pro Fishing in Minnesota.  It's the Arctic Armour Plus .  First 2 piece suit for me and offers lot's of neat features.
I considered the deal from pro fishing.  Even with exchange it was worth it for an Arctic armour!  I ended up with a striker suit, it's pretty awesome and extremely maneuverable and warm.
I like the features of Actic Armour plus which I read on line.  Does anybody in Ontario sell them?
